attributes.action: The Co-op Sports Ground, on Brumby Wood Lane, Scunthorpe.
attributes.additional_details:
To put a STOP to the proposed erection of a fence at:-


The Co-op Sports Ground, off Brumby Wood Lane, Scunthorpe

Read more: http://www.scunthorpetelegraph.co.uk

This has never been a issue for 'Years', and has been a public space for as long as i can remember. Surely a notice of planning should have been put up for the public to agree/object to such proposals!

rejection.details: A matter for the Council to answer.
